trans-unit.source: Current preview limitations for Azure Active Directory B2B collaboration | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Current preview limitations for Azure Active Directory B2B collaboration | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory B2B supports your cross-company relationships by enabling business partners to selectively access your corporate applications
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory B2B supports your cross-company relationships by enabling business partners to selectively access your corporate applications

trans-unit.source: Current preview limitations for Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) B2B collaboration
trans-unit.target: Current preview limitations for Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) B2B collaboration

trans-unit.source: Multi-factor authentication (MFA) not supported on external users.
trans-unit.target: Multi-factor authentication (MFA) not supported on external users.

trans-unit.source: For example, if Contoso has MFA, but Partner Org does not, then Partner Org users can't be granted MFA through B2B collaboration.
trans-unit.target: For example, if Contoso has MFA, but Partner Org does not, then Partner Org users can't be granted MFA through B2B collaboration.

trans-unit.source: Invites are possible only via CSV; individual invites and API access are not supported.
trans-unit.target: Invites are possible only via CSV; individual invites and API access are not supported.

trans-unit.source: Only Azure AD Global Administrators can upload .csv files.
trans-unit.target: Only Azure AD Global Administrators can upload .csv files.

trans-unit.source: Invitations to consumer email addresses (such as hotmail.com, Gmail.com, or comcast.net) are currently not supported.
trans-unit.target: Invitations to consumer email addresses (such as hotmail.com, Gmail.com, or comcast.net) are currently not supported.

trans-unit.source: External user access to on-premises applications not tested.
trans-unit.target: External user access to on-premises applications not tested.

trans-unit.source: External users are not automatically cleaned up when the actual user is deleted from their directory.
trans-unit.target: External users are not automatically cleaned up when the actual user is deleted from their directory.

trans-unit.source: Invitations to DLs are not supported.
trans-unit.target: Invitations to DLs are not supported.

trans-unit.source: Maximum of 2,000 records can be uploaded via CSV.
trans-unit.target: Maximum of 2,000 records can be uploaded via CSV.
